```{r libs}
library(tidyverse)
library(prettydoc)
library(here)
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE, 
  message = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE, 
  fig.align = "center"
  )
# Center all plot titles
theme_update(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

# Load Data
```{r load}
oil <- read_csv(here::here("oil_consumption_per_cap.csv"))
sdi <- read_csv(here::here("sdi.csv"))
```

# Clean Data

```{r clean}
oil_clean <- oil %>%
  # Coerce types
  transmute(
    country = as.factor(country),
    across(`1965`:`2019`, as.numeric)
    ) %>% 
  # Pivot 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = `1965`:`2019`, 
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "Oil Consumption per Person (tonnes/person)",
    )

sdi_clean <- sdi %>% 
  # Coerce types
  transmute(
    country = as.factor(country),
    across(`1990`:`2019`, as.numeric)
    ) %>% 
  # Pivot
  pivot_longer(
    cols = `1990`:`2019`, 
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "Sustainable Development Index",
    ) 

dataset <- sdi_clean %>% 
  # Join data by year and country
  left_join(oil_clean, by = c("year", "country")) %>% 
  # Drop any missing data
  drop_na()
```
